page.title: 11THE RED LION AT HUNNINGHAM
page.content: We went to visit the{" Red Lion"}in {Hunningham}. The owner,{Mr Spicer}has been there since April of this year ({1985}). {Mr Spicer}has been an innkeeper for{21}years. We asked him if he enjoyed the life of being an innkeeper and his answer was "{YES}". The '{Red Lion}' has been standing since the 16th century . The {Red Lion has many attractions , for example the {River and Bridge}with an amazing view of the {Red Lion }from it.We asked {Mr {Spicer}if he had a timetable of a typical day. His answer to that was{ { NO}. The pub is opened at eleven o 'clock in the morning until two thirty in the afternoon. Then it is opened at six at night until eleven o 'clock at night. There have been some changes in the way of trade because shops are now allowed to sell wines and spirits and people can buy them to drink at home.
